domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@GOPLeader I live in a Covid-19 hot state.  I have Cancer. I have to have surgery next week. My husband can't visit. I'll be in the same building as Covid-19 folks. Medical professionals are struggling with getting PPE (really? Still?)
And you're worried abt freaking statues? (rolling eyes)
